articles.author: Guru baran
articles.title: New Outlook Flaw Let Attackers Access Hashed Passwords - GBHackers
articles.description: A new Outlook vulnerability that can be used to extract NTLMv2 hashes by exploiting Outlook, Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA), and Windows File Explorer has been identified.
articles.content:
A new Outlook vulnerability that can be used to extract NTLMv2 hashes by exploiting Outlook, Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA), and Windows File Explorer has been identified.
